name: Slick 50 HM Engine Treatment
categoryPath: Auto & Tires/Motor Oil, Transmission Fluid & Car Lubricant/Additives

reviews.name: Slick 50 HM Engine Treatment
reviews.reviewText:
I've used Slick 50 Engine Treatment in my vehicle since I bought my 2002 Jeep Grand Cherokee brand new 12 years ago. I pour a bottle in the crank case after every oil change, and that's always with 100% synthetic oil.

I used to buy it at pep boys. But, I found out wal-mart sells it cheaper than anyone else around. So, I've been buying it there for the last 3 years. 195,000+ miles later, my engine is still as strong as ever, and it has passed smog tests every time when inspected!
reviews.title: Still going strong!

reviews.name: Slick 50 HM Engine Treatment
reviews.reviewText: In our business we drive vehicles in excess of 333k. We put slick 50 in every engine we own. Thia product will pay for itself hundred fold. Only fools drive without it..........try it.
reviews.title: FABULOUS PRODUCT

reviews.name: Slick 50 HM Engine Treatment
reviews.reviewText: Great product to keep your machine running smooth. Been using Slick products for 25+ years and using them not only extends engine life you get better gas mileage. My SUV is rated at 24 mpg highway. Just made a 1,200 trip and averaged 27.2 mpg.
reviews.title: A must for a tired engine

reviews.name: Slick 50 HM Engine Treatment
reviews.reviewText: My Honda Civic was sounding rough at 88k.I had the mechanic drain the oil and put in Slick 50.It purred.I sold the car at 263k miles and it still purred.I'm sold and always use it on my new Honda Civic.
reviews.title: Like a new car

reviews.name: Slick 50 HM Engine Treatment
reviews.reviewText: I use it in all my vehicles with every oil change every 25000 miles. That's a savings of 9 oil changes at $29.00+ an oil change = $261 savings. Oil can last millions of years in the ground but only 3 months in my engine or on the shelf ?
reviews.title: Treats the metel not the oil
